explanation: [0-0] A man and a woman are sitting at a table. The man is wearing a black short-sleeved shirt and jeans, while the woman is wearing a white tank top and holding a piece of cutlery. Opposite the woman sits another person wearing a white top and a white headscarf. On the table, there is a plate of food, two round plates, and a glass of green drink. Next to it is a pot of plants. In the background, there are a few tables and chairs. Next to them is a white building with a window.
